name: Iron Boulder
flavorText: It resembles a Pokémon described in a dubious magazine as a Terrakion that had been modified by an evil organization.

previous.name: Raging Bolt
previous.flavorText: It's said to incinerate everything around it with lightning launched from its fur. Very little is known about this creature.
